lines.text: Once upon a time little ol' Bosko's mammy gave him a nice bag of cookies to take to his gran'ma. As he walked through the woods he heard a fright...
Mm-mmm! Those cookies shore does smell presumpt'ous. They look presumpt'ous.
Why, they is presumpt'ous! Now, Bosko, you go straight to gran'ma's. And don't you be eatin' none of them cookies.
No, sir! They can't have my gran'ma's cookies. Straight to gran'ma's here I go. Gran'ma! Gran'ma! Gran'ma!
